name: Lifestyle Design Dashboard Notion Template [Original]
description: The Lifestyle Design Dashboard (LDD) is your aesthetic and strategic hub for designing the life of your dreams. It’s all about tactical execution, self-discovery and becoming your own muse. While it’s not meant to replace your personal planner or daily calendar, this dashboard serves as your ultimate Master Plan x Lifestyle Blueprint, featuring templates for reflection, goal setting, routines, vision boards, career mapping and more.Originally created as a personal "Life Wiki," LDD helps keep pri
features: A device (computer, phone, or tablet).; A free Notion account.; This is a digital product; refunds are not available as access is instant upon purchase.; Templates are for personal use only—please no reproducing or reselling.
